description: Retrieve lightweight metadata for skills by skill_id or by multiple tags (up to 3). Returns skill information excluding large fields like skill_markdown and full description.

configuration.query:
FROM agent_skills 
| WHERE skill_id == ?skill_id 
     OR MV_CONTAINS(tags, ?tag1) 
     OR MV_CONTAINS(tags, ?tag2) 
     OR MV_CONTAINS(tags, ?tag3) 
| KEEP skill_id, name, domain, tags, author, version, rating, created_at

skill_id.description: Unique identifier for the skill (optional if tags provided)

tag1.description: First tag to search for (optional if skill_id provided)
